entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:37 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
